channel.title: How to add custom npcs?
channel.description: I cant seem to find a tutor on this. How do i add custom npcs to my server?

item.title: How to add custom npcs?
item.dc:creator: @Zivearia Zivearia
item.description:
@Zivearia wrote:

[quote=“OjamaBoy, post:5, topic:391249”][quote author=Zivearia link=topic=487190.msg3570569#msg3570569 date=1303006255]

Im not looking for jokes -.-
Rep - for you… if i could
=.=

Go to client sided help not server help, you uptight prick. But it’s okay since i still love everyone, i just love you a little less now.
[/quote]
This is more of a mixture of both server and client help.
And you couldve just said that instead of being a jerk and posting something totally un-related from server help.[/quote]

Why, i told you, they show it in Digimon, would you like me to go pull a video and show you? Dont think im bluffing child, i dont bluff. I dont see how it was such a “Jerk” move, now go in client section and post this. FYI, i dont love you almost at all. GOOD DAY

Read full topic
